overview: Lights! Camera! Action! And when Wicked points the camera, there's bound to be plenty of action! Mikayla Mendez lights up the screen as she seduces the camera, her man, and even sultry Sativa Rose. And when Mikayla isn't on set, it's time for fellow Wicked girl Alektra Blue to shine. Sit back and prepare to be seduced by Sex on Set.
title: Sex on Set
